attributes.action: Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman should be given an OBE or MBE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you are aware back in 2004 Ewan and Charley travelled fom London to New York and again  in 2007 when they went down to Cape Town on their motorbikes and did it for the cause for UNICEF and countless other causes Along with their crew (Claudio Von Planta,David Alexanian,Russ Malkin,Jim Foster,Dai Jones and Jimmy Simak and the crew back at base in london who pulled the strings to make the trips a reailty).

that is why we think that they should get an award or at least an honour for what they did.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
